title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Sep 29 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Sep 29 2022
description:
Our thoughts and prayers remain with the people of Florida. Governor DeSantis predicts Ian will be in the Top 5 storms to ever hit Florida and a 500-year flooding event. Clay says, "Some of you, a good bit of advice -- I've done it in my own house -- may still have battery-powered radios to be able to listen to when everything else is down." Visit FloridaDisaster.org to help. "Imbecile" Joy Behar attacks Governor DeSantis on climate change. Buck says, "This is a religious belief for lunatics, that climate change actually responds to politicians' belief or disbelief one way or another." Rep. Lee Zeldin, GOP candidate for governor of New York, joins Clay and Buck -- both hosts together today in our New York City studio -- to explain how a Republican can win in New York. C&B on fan encounters. #BringBackMasks trends on Twitter.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
